page.title: 17MY COMPUTER GAMES by Suzanne
page.content: Computer games are very popular and I spend a lot of time playing them at home. {'Hangman'}is a spelling game in which you choose one of eight groups of words. After choosing, several dashes come up on the screen and you have to guess the letters in the word. You only get nine chances before you are hanged. {'Bat and Ball'}is similar to tennis. You get a little ball that moves about the screen and you have to hit it. {'Dare devil Denis'}is a brilliant game. The player is Denis. First of all Denis is skiing, then on a bike and lastly on a speed boat. He has to go as fast as he can jumping and avoiding obstacles on a course. As levels are completed harder courses are tackled including ones with policemen who try to stop Denis.
